GSD.description:
ALSA: oss: Fix PCM OSS buffer allocation overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.32 by commit 7a40cbf3579a8e14849ba7ce46309c1992658d2b. For more details please see the references link.
